column4: I there a way to configure gnomesword for "Catholic" mode, where it still has all of the original books of the Bible that the protestant Bibles don't have?
better asks the developers of that program.
there's only one person on #gnomesword and they're probably asleep :-(
I don't mean going to the irc channel. You get better information by going to the projects page, subscribing to their mailing lists and forums.
